meanings.type: Godan verb with 'bu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to fly; to soar esp. 飛ぶ飛行機は山の上を飛んだ。The plane flew over the mountain.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'bu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to jump; to leap; to spring; to bound; to hop esp. 跳ぶ君はどのくらい高く跳べますか。How high can you jump?

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'bu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to spatter; to scatter; to splash; to fly (e.g. of sparks)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'bu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to hurry; to rush 彼女は良い知らせを持って学校から家にとんで帰ったあの秋の日のことを考えた。彼女はリレーチームの選手に選ばれたのだった。She thought of the fine autumn day when she had rushed home from school with the good news; she was chosen to be on the relay team.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'bu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to flee; to run off; to escape

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'bu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to disappear; to vanish; to fade; to thin out

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'bu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to break off; to come off; to fall off; to blow (of a fuse) ヒューズが飛んだ。A fuse has blown.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'bu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to be sent out (of an order); to fly (of false rumours, catcalls, etc.) 首相が重病だといううわさが飛んでいる。Word is passing that the Prime Minister is seriously ill.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'bu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to come flying (of a punch, kick, etc.)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'bu' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to be missing (of a page, stitch, etc.); to skip; to jump (e.g. of a conversation) 彼の話はいろいろなところへ飛ぶ。He frequently jumps from one topic to another while he is talking.
跳ぶ 【とぶ】、翔ぶ 【とぶ】
翔ぶ: Out-dated kanji or kanji usage.

sentences.translation: The plane flew over the mountain.
She thought of the fine autumn day when she had rushed home from school with the good news; she was chosen to be on the relay team.
Word is passing that the Prime Minister is seriously ill.
He frequently jumps from one topic to another while he is talking.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to jump out; to rush out; to fly out そのスピードを出した車は道路に飛び出した子供を、間一髪で、避けることができた。The speeding car missed the child, who ran out into the road, by only a hairsbreadth.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to appear (suddenly)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to protrude; to project ここの軟骨が飛び出しています。The cartilage has slipped out here.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to butt in

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to run away (e.g. from home); to break away; to cut ties with (e.g. workplace) 彼が家を飛び出したのは父親が厳しかったせいだ。His running away from home is due to his father's severity.
飛びだす 【とびだす】、飛出す 【とびだす】、跳び出す 【とびだす】、跳びだす 【とびだす】

meanings.meaning: 1. flight; flying; aviation
1. flight; flying; aviation

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to let fly; to make fly; to send flying; to blow off (e.g. in the wind); to launch; to fire; to hurl; to shoot 私たちはその鳥を飛ばした。We let the bird fly.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to skip over; to leave out; to omit; to drop (e.g. a stitch) その俳優はせりふを１行とばした。The actor missed a line.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to run fast; to drive fast; to gallop 試合が始まれば、彼は初めからとばしていくだろうし、ルチアーノは簡単に叩きのめされてしまうだろう。When the bell rings, he'll start strong and Luciano will lose quickly.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to spray; to splash; to spatter

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to say without reservation; to call out (e.g. a jeer); to rattle off (e.g. a joke)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to spread (e.g. a rumour); to circulate; to send out (a message); to issue (e.g. an appeal)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to transfer (to a less important post); to send away (e.g. to a provincial branch); to demote

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to dispatch quickly (e.g. a reporter)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to get rid of; to burn off (alcohol)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to attack (e.g. with a leg manoeuvre)

meanings.type: Auxiliary verb, Godan verb with 'su' ending
meanings.meaning: 11. to do vigorously; to do roughly; to do energetically

1. to jump over; to leap over; to clear 犬は囲いを跳び越えて庭に入ってきた。The dog jumped over the fence into the garden.
2. to fly over; to fly across ボールははずんで塀を飛び越えた。The ball bounced over the wall.
3. to jump ahead (of someone); to skip over; to leapfrog
跳び越える 【とびこえる】
